publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4208 Dennis Canavan: Scottish Record at the Commonwealth Games—That the Parliament congratulates all those who represented Scotland at the Commonwealth Games in Melbourne, particularly the medal winners who did us proud by achieving a Scottish record of 11 gold medals out of an impressive total of 29. Supported by: Mr David Davidson*, Murray Tosh*, Brian Adam*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bill Butler*, Mike Pringle*, Tricia Marwick*, Campbell Martin*, Murdo Fraser*, John Swinburne*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Chris Ballance*, Mary Scanlon*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Shiona Baird*, Mark Ballard*, Robin Harper*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mr John Swinney*, Eleanor Scott*, Des McNulty*, Linda Fabiani*, Michael Matheson*, David McLetchie*, Bristow Muldoon*, Margaret Mitchell*, Michael McMahon*, Scott Barrie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*, Patrick Harvie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Sandra White*, Susan Deacon*, Dr Elaine Murray*

S2M-4208 Dennis Canavan: Scottish Record at the Commonwealth Games—That the Parliament congratulates all those who represented Scotland at the Commonwealth Games in Melbourne, particularly the medal winners who did us proud by achieving a Scottish record of 11 gold medals out of an impressive total of 29. Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Murray Tosh, Brian Adam, Nicola Sturgeon, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bill Butler, Mike Pringle, Tricia Marwick, Campbell Martin, Murdo Fraser, John Swinburne, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Chris Ballance, Mary Scanlon, Mrs Nanette Milne, Shiona Baird, Mark Ballard, Robin Harper, Mr Mark Ruskell, Mr John Swinney, Eleanor Scott, Des McNulty, Linda Fabiani, Michael Matheson, David McLetchie, Bristow Muldoon, Margaret Mitchell, Michael McMahon, Scott Barrie, Margaret Jamieson, Mr Adam Ingram, Christine Grahame, Patrick Harvie, Fiona Hyslop, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Sandra White, Susan Deacon, Dr Elaine Murray, Alex Neil, Mr Jim Wallace, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Phil Gallie, Mr Jamie Stone, Donald Gorrie, Jackie Baillie, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Brian Monteith, Karen Gillon*, Iain Smith*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
